77 TEST_FILE("ltc_6806.c")
78 
79 /*========== Definitions and Implementations for Unit Test ==================*/
80 
81 /** SPI data configuration struct for LTC communication */
82 static spiDAT1_t spi_kLtcDataConfig[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
83  {
84  /* struct is implemented in the TI HAL and uses uppercase true and false */
85  .CS_HOLD = TRUE, /* If true, HW chip select kept active between words */
86  .WDEL = FALSE, /* Activation of delay between words */
87  .DFSEL = SPI_FMT_0, /* Data word format selection */
88  .CSNR = SPI_HARDWARE_CHIP_SELECT_2_ACTIVE, /* CS2 enabled */
89  },
90 };
91 
92 /**
93  * SPI interface configuration for LTC communication
94  * This is a list of structs because of multistring
95  */
96 SPI_INTERFACE_CONFIG_s spi_ltcInterface[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
97  {
98  .pConfig = &spi_kLtcDataConfig[0u],
99  .pNode = spiREG1,
100  .pGioPort = &(spiREG1->PC3),
101  .csPin = 2u,
102  .csType = SPI_CHIP_SELECT_HARDWARE,
103  },
104 };
105 
106 SPI_INTERFACE_CONFIG_s spi_ltcInterfaceSecondary[BS_NR_OF_STRINGS] = {
107  {
108  .pConfig = &spi_kLtcDataConfig[0u],
109  .pNode = spiREG1,
110  .pGioPort = &(spiREG1->PC3),
111  .csPin = 2u,
112  .csType = SPI_CHIP_SELECT_HARDWARE,
113  },
114 };
115 
116 /*========== Setup and Teardown =============================================*/
117 void setUp(void) {
118 }
119 
120 void tearDown(void) {
121 }
122 
123 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
124 void testLTC_SetFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(void) {
125  OS_EnterTaskCritical_Expect();
126  OS_ExitTaskCritical_Expect();
127  static LTC_STATE_s test_ltc_state = {0};
128  test_ltc_state.first_measurement_made = false;
129  TEST_LTC_SetFirstMeasurementCycleFinished(&test_ltc_state);
130  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL_UINT8(true, test_ltc_state.first_measurement_made);
131 }
BS_NR_OF_STRINGS
#define BS_NR_OF_STRINGS
Number of parallel strings in the battery pack.
